entry.title: Devops engineer
entry.text:
#вакансия #vacancy #job #Belarus #Russsia #Ukraine #office #remote #fulltime #flexible #devops #aws #docker  #kubernetes #terraform
Position - DevOps Engineer
Company - Sphere Software
Location - Belarus, Russia, Ukraine
Work - Remote or Office, Full-time
Salary - 3700$ - 4800$ gross (3500$-4500$ nett)

Sphere Software is  partnered innovative trading platform with post-trade settlement and payments system and looking for DevOps engineer. 

Requirements:
🔹 5+ years of experience as an SRE, DevOps engineer, operations engineer or similar
🔹 Expert at Linux system administration
🔹 Deep understanding of AWS technologies  
🔹 Experience using IaC tools such as Ansible or Terraform 
🔹 Hands-on experience using Docker, AWS ECS or other orchestration tools
🔹 Experience with bare metal infrastructures preferred
🔹 Proficient in Python or alternative scripting language 
🔹 Experience managing a metrics driven system infrastructure
🔹 Familiarity and hands on experience with common CI/CD pipeline tools (we use Jenkins) and container technologies
🔹 Experience using Hashicorp Vault and Consul (big plus)
🔹 Knowledge of cybersecurity mitigation and best practice (big plus)
🔹 Relevant experience from an exchange, proprietary trading firm or top tier bank (big plus) 
 
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
🔹 Maintain and improve upon the uptime reliability of the overall platform 
🔹 Investigation and handling of issues in all public environments 
🔹 Designing automation tools and improving upon our deployment and release pipeline 
🔹 Build monitoring and alerting tools to keep internal teams and external stakeholders informed about system health and platform viability
🔹 Identify and advocate for changes vital to the stability and supportability of the system
🔹 Support the growth and scale of our infrastructure by suggesting and implementing new technology architecture
 
On-site benefits:
🔹 Competitive compensation and paid time off
🔹 Team of professionals providing you with the opportunity to grow
🔹 Sports compensation
🔹 Team building events.

Feel free to contact me for more info! 👋  @alex_ithr
